sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YETA3100 ( DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #edacRvyy# , #settGbcd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(FINA_SEQN)+1,1) FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) , #imdeGbcd# , #finaCode# , fcBass0300CDNM(#dpobCd#, #finaCode#) , #acntNumb# , #icnmYear# , #paytAmnt# , #deduAmnt# , (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #imdeGbcd#, '11')) , (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #finaCode#, '11')) , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YETA3100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# , SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn# , IMDE_GBCD=#imdeGbcd# , FINA_CODE=#finaCode# , FINA_NAME=(fcBass0300CDNM(#dpobCd#, #finaCode#) ) , ACNT_NUMB=#acntNumb# , ICNM_YEAR=#icnmYear# , PAYT_AMNT=#paytAmnt# , DEDU_AMNT=#deduAmnt# , IMDE_TXCD= (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #imdeGbcd#, '11')) , FINA_TXCD= (fcBass0300ITEMNM(#dpobCd#, #finaCode#, '11')) , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn#

DELETE FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy# AND SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FINA_SEQN=#finaSeqn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, SETT_GBCD) AS SETT_GBNM , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, IMDE_GBCD) AS IMDE_GBNM , IMDE_GBCD AS imdeGbcdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, (SELECT C.COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = DPOB_CD AND C.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y004' AND C.MANGE_ITEM11 = IMDE_TXCD)) AS imdeGbcdcommCdNm , FINA_CODE AS finaCodecommCd , FINA_NAME AS finaCodecommCdNm , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3100 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FINA_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3100 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
EDAC_RVYY=#edacRvyy#
SETT_GBCD=#settGbcd#
SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EDAC_RVYY , SETT_GBCD , SYSTEMKEY , FINA_SEQN , IMDE_GBCD , FINA_CODE , FINA_NAME , ACNT_NUMB , ICNM_YEAR , PAYT_AMNT , DEDU_AMNT , IMDE_TXCD , FINA_TXCD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YETA3100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EDAC_RVYY DESC , SETT_GBCD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FINA_SEQN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YETA3100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EDAC_RVYY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
